disclaimer: Disclaimer: The information provided is generated by ChatGPT, an advanced AI trained on extensive sets of public data. While we strive for accuracy, for medical advice always consult trusted healthcare professionals.

recipes.title: Recipes for Meals
recipes.body: Get personalized recipes, cooking tips, and culinary ideas suited to your tastes and dietary preferences.

fitness.title: Workout Routines
fitness.body: Whether you're aiming for muscle gain, weight loss, or overall wellness, to help you achieve your fitness goals.
fitness.example2: Effective fitness plans for weight loss

nutrition.title: Nutritional information
nutrition.body: Our AI can help you explore the effects of minerals and vitamins on your overall health.
nutrition.example1: What are the benefits of Vitamin C?
nutrition.example2: Role of Omega-3 fatty acids in health

macros.title: Macros Setup Help
macros.body: Your macro goals will be tailored to fit your age, height, weight, gender, dietary preferences, and fitness objectives.
macros.example1: What should my daily calorie intake be for weight maintenance, considering I am [age] years old, [height] tall, weigh [weight], and am [gender]?
macros.example2: How much protein do I need daily for muscle building, given my age of [age], height of [height], weight of [weight], and being [gender]?
